About Me

IT developer focusing on web technology

GuoQingcun 2018-05-11

Intro

My name is Qingcun Guo(郭清存). You can call me Grace. I was born in 1985s. I am an IT developer focusing on web technology. Now I am employed by 24xiaomai.com as an java engineer. In spare time, I like reading book, surfing internet, watching movie.

So On.
